programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (L'anniversaire de Starla) S6 (11/24)
programme.desc: «L'anniversaire de Starla»Starla's wild west birthday party is in trouble when her cake gets carried off by a runaway train. Can she, Blaze and AJ catch up and save the cake before it's too late?

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Le trésor du tigre) S6 (13/24)
programme.desc: «Le trésor du tigre»The Tiger Treasure: Blaze, AJ, and Stripes put their explorer skills to the test as they follow the trail to the fabled Tiger Treasure. (S6, ep 14).

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (La plus rapide de tous) S6 (18/24)
programme.desc: «La plus rapide de tous»When a greedy queen casts a spell to make a few of our friends go slow, Blaze and AJ must race her for the magical cure.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Megabot) S6 (18/20)
programme.desc: «Megabot»Megabot!: Blaze and AJ help their amazing new friend Megabot get to Axle City in time for the big Robot Parade. (S6, ep 20).

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Pirate Musical!) S6 (20/23)
programme.desc: «Pirate Musical!»In the first ever Blaze Musical, Blaze, AJ, Crusher, and Pickle are on a daring quest to find the pieces of the Broken Key and unlock a secret treasure.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Histoires au coin du feu) S6 (22/23)
programme.desc: «Histoires au coin du feu»It's a campout under the stars! Blaze, AJ, Starla, Crusher, and Pickle are gathered around the campfire to tell the most amazing stories they can make up! And the best part? Whoever tells the best story wins the last marshmallow!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Sparkle à la rescousse) S7 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Sparkle à la rescousse»When Crusher sends Blaze away with one of his latest cheats, Blaze's little sister Sparkle comes to save the day and bring her brother back in time so they can race together to win the Teamwork Trophy!

programme.title: Santiago des mers (The Pirate Parade) S1 (n°11)
programme.desc: «The Pirate Parade»The Pirate Parade: It's time for the annual Pirate Parade! That is, unless Escarlata has anything to say about it. (S1, ep 11b).

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (La journée du oui) S1 (n°7)
programme.desc: «La journée du oui»Baby convinces Daddy to say "yup" to everything for a day. What's the worst that could happen?

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Swimming With the Sharks) S1 (n°26)
programme.desc: «Swimming With the Sharks»When Baby and his family become reality TV stars, they start to lose sight of what makes them the Sharks.

programme.title: Mini Chef (Mac and Cheese) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Mac and Cheese»Mac and Cheese: Tiny Chef makes rainy day Mac N Cheese but a leaky roof creates chaos in his tree stump kitchen! (S1, ep 8a).

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Un essaim de papillons / Où est La Galinetta d'or ?) S5 (7/26)
programme.desc: «Un essaim de papillons / Où est La Galinetta d'or ?»The statue of Chickaletta has been stolen by Mayor Humdinger and is making its way through Adventure Bay's underground tunnel system.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (La musique et Paddington) S2 (21/27)
programme.desc: «La musique et Paddington»The Adventures of Paddington is a new version of a familiar bear. It's a heartwarming show about being curious, being good to others, and being part of a loving family.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'embouteillage) S2 (13/52)
programme.desc: «L'embouteillage»Granny and Grandpa Pig have invited Peppa and her family to lunch. On the way, Peppa, George, Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig get caught in a very long traffic jam. They still haven't arrived by the time lunch is ready, so Grandpa Pig decides to bring the lunch to them - in his wheelbarrow. There's enough delicious food for everyone in the traffic jam.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les flaques d'eau de mer) S2 (10/52)
programme.desc: «Les flaques d'eau de mer»Peppa and George are at the seaside with Granny and Grandpa Pig. Peppa and George like sandy beaches, but this is a different kind of beach, with lots of rocks and little rock pools to explore. Peppa, George, Granny and Grandpa Pig have fun with a little crab, a seashell and a fossil. Peppa rescues a little fish in her bucket and puts it back in the sea.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le jour de sortie de Teddy) S2 (4/52)
programme.desc: «Le jour de sortie de Teddy»Peppa and her family are having a picnic lunch. Mr Zebra the Postman and Zoë Zebra are having a picnic too, so they decide to have one big picnic together. When it's time to go home, Peppa is having such a good time that, when it's home time, she leaves her teddy behind. But all ends well when Zoë Zebra and Mr Zebra the Postman make a very special delivery to Peppa's house...

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Collection) S1 (19/78)
programme.desc: «The Collection»The Collection: Upon seeing Ron's stick collection, Froga learns for the first time what "a collection" is. Anna would like to create one of her own. (S1, ep 19).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Fixing Things) S1 (20/78)
programme.desc: «Fixing Things»Bubu catches a cold, he's unable to fix Ron's spinning top and Christopher's broken piano. While Bubu is resting, she "fixes" the broken items for him. Christopher's piano starts playing bubbles, Froga realizes she should leave the fixing to Bubu.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Blue est triste) S1 (6/17)
programme.desc: «Blue est triste»Blue's feeling sad, so we play Blue's Clues to figure out why. Along the way to figuring out Blue's Clues, we help our Felt Friends and Blues' friends from her school deal with emotions and feelings in different situations.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Les chemins de la gloire) S1 (1/20)
programme.desc: «Les chemins de la gloire»Crusher is doing everything he can to keep the other monster machines away from the world championship racing at the Monster Dome; he tries with bubbles, mud balls and robotic knights.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Au pied de l'arc-en-ciel / Grillés !) S2 (1/20)
programme.desc: «Au pied de l'arc-en-ciel / Grillés !»The search for gold at the end of the rainbow leads the Deer Squad to an amazing Frost Mountain and a new deer friend! // The Deer Squad have to deal with a cheesy situation thanks to Sir Steel's latest invention - The Giant Toaster!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Plans a Party / Paddington Learns the Violin) S1 (9/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Plans a Party / Paddington Learns the Violin»Mr Brown has forgotten to get Mrs Brown a Birthday present, Paddington decides to hold a surprise party. // Judy does not like Violin lessons so hides from Ms Potts. Paddington takes up the challenge. Watch out ears!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington et l'album souvenir) S1 (18/54)
programme.desc: «Paddington et l'album souvenir»Paddington decides to make a scrapbook of memories and tries to include all his friends to show Aunt Lucy.

programme.title: Mini Chef (Apple Pie) S1 (n°6)
programme.desc: «Apple Pie»Guacamole: Tiny Chef makes guacamole and has to learn to share when his friends want to help using a new kitchen tool. (S1, ep 6a).

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Les sept aliments / Un portrait au poil) S1 (n°26)
programme.desc: «Les sept aliments / Un portrait au poil»The Barbababies think their food can make them change colours and shapes. They decide to find the right food for each of them. // Barbabeau lacks inspiration, he can't create anymore. The whole family helps by suggesting new subjects to paint.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (L'arbre de Barbapapa / L'anniversaire des barbabébés) S1 (1/52)
programme.desc: «L'arbre de Barbapapa / L'anniversaire des barbabébés»Barbapapa and Barbamama return to the tree they were born under. It's in bad condition. They must rescue it quickly without disturbing the nearby animals. // It's the Barbababies's birthday. They all want to do something different with Barbapapa!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Captain Varech / Riquiqui le Tardigrade) S1 (n°9)
programme.desc: «Captain Varech / Riquiqui le Tardigrade»As Super Shark and Captain Kelp, Baby Shark and William set out to save playtime-but is Captain Kelp just a sidekick? // Baby Shark adopts a teensy tiny pet, but is he ready for a big responsibility?

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Best in Flow) S2 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Best in Flow»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Hide and Seek) S1 (16/78)
programme.desc: «Hide and Seek»Anna and her friends are outside playing Ron's favorite game, Hide-and-Seek! Anna is the Seeker and quickly finds Froga, Christopher and Bubu. When the friends work together to try to find Ron, they realize he's found the best hiding spot of all.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Bubble Trouble) S1 (21/78)
programme.desc: «Bubble Trouble»Bubble Trouble: Bubu's bubble maker invention works so well, it creates an enormous bubble that Christopher gets trapped in! His friends are desperate to rescue him! (S1, ep 21).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Une rencontre mystérieuse) S1 (65/78)
programme.desc: «Une rencontre mystérieuse»Mysterious Visitor: Bubu is eager to meet a real space alien so he builds a homemade antenna and sound box to communicate with outer space. (S1, ep 65).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Squeaky Boots) S1 (n°66)
programme.desc: «The Squeaky Boots»The Squeaky Boots: Christopher leads the friends in a fun game of hide and seek, but Froga soon realizes that her new boots are letting out a noisy squeak! (S1, ep 66).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Greedy Gobbler) S1 (n°67)
programme.desc: «The Greedy Gobbler»The Greedy Gobbler: While Bubu and Christopher want to enjoy an hazelnut snack, their hazelnuts go missing! Then Anna, Froga and Ron's chocolate snack also disappears! (S1, ep 67).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (A Longchair for Ron) S1 (n°68)
programme.desc: «A Longchair for Ron»A sleeping spider squats Ron's swing, and he can't take a nap. He laments to Anna and Froga that he wishes he had a deck chair to sleep on. This gives them the idea to surprise him with one.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Emilie Eléphant) S2 (2/52)
programme.desc: «Emilie Eléphant»There's a new pupil at the playgroup, Emily Elephant. Everybody wants to be her friend because she is very good at building blocks and can make a loud noise with her trunk.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'ami de George) S2 (6/52)
programme.desc: «L'ami de George»Rebecca Rabbit has a little bother called Richard who is the same age as George. George and Richard each have a toy dinosaur but George and Richard are not very good at sharing their toys. Mummy Pig shows George and Richard that they can have much more fun at the playground if they play together, just like their big sisters.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La mare aux petits bateaux) S2 (12/52)
programme.desc: «La mare aux petits bateaux»Peppa and George learn that throwing waste away is fun, especially if you can divide it into special bins so that the waste can be reused. So recycle!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Monsieur l'épouvantail) S2 (7/52)
programme.desc: «Monsieur l'épouvantail»Peppa and George go to the beach with Grandpa and Grandma Pig and find tide pools there. Peppa doesn't like it at first, but when she discovers what can be experienced with and in such pools and she even rescues a fish, she wants one too.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le jeu "Spéciale jour de pluie") S4 (9/52)
programme.desc: «Le jeu "Spéciale jour de pluie"»Baby Alexander is too young to talk, until Peppa teaches him his first word.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La bosse de maman Rabbit) S4 (10/52)
programme.desc: «La bosse de maman Rabbit»Granddad Dog takes Peppa, George and Danny Dog to visit Grampy Rabbit's lighthouse.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Pedro le cow-boy) S4 (11/52)
programme.desc: «Pedro le cow-boy»Peppa, George, Suzy Sheep, Wendy Wold and Danny Dog visit Pedro Pony who's pretending to be a cowboy. He welcomes them to his cowboy camp. The group imagine they are in the Wild West and do cowboy things, such as eating beans, singing sings, telling stories and sleeping in the tent at night. But even cowboys can get scared, especially when wild animals are lurking outside the tent. The fun goes on until evening, when Peppa and friends need to go home.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Treasure Hunt) S1 (22/52)
programme.desc: «The Treasure Hunt»Mr. Strict's twins visit the barbababies. The barbababies organize a treasure hunt for the twins and enjoy the great outdoors.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (It's Only a Mystery... / The Battle) S1 (6/52)
programme.desc: «It's Only a Mystery... / The Battle»Taking after his favourite detective, Barbabravo looks for a case to solve. Can he solve the mystery of the missing ice statue? // Inspired by their favourite heroes, the Barbababies make costumes. But no heroes are possible without villains...

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Glacier Monster Machine) S5 (10/21)
programme.desc: «Glacier Monster Machine»Gasquatch invites Blaze and AJ to his ice cream party! But he forgot something important - the ice cream! So, Blaze transforms into an Ice Cream Truck and races to reach Gasquatch's house in time!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Le pouvoir du recyclage) S5 (8/20)
programme.desc: «Le pouvoir du recyclage»When Axle City is visited by a littering raccoon, it's up to Blaze to save the day as a Super Recycling Truck! He cleans up the town and rescues his friends - just in time for a final showdown with the Litter Critter!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Semi-Remorque Blaze) S5 (13/20)
programme.desc: «Semi-Remorque Blaze»When a windstorm blows away the supplies for Stripes' Animal Party, Blaze transforms into the one Monster Machine strong enough to haul it all back - a Big Rig! There's nothing he can't pull with that Big Rig Force!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (La voleuse de bonbons) S5 (19/20)
programme.desc: «La voleuse de bonbons»Officer Blaze just got his biggest case yet: tracking down the mischievous Treat Thief! With help from Officer Anna, Blaze sets out to stop the thief and recover every stolen treat!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Derby Dino) S6 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Derby Dino»Today, dinosaur Blaze is teaming up with his prehistoric pal Zeg to compete in... the Dino Derby! But will this dino duo have what it takes to outrace the rest and become Dino Derby champions?

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Le badge de course de Sparkle) S6 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Le badge de course de Sparkle»It's more Blaze family fun in this high octane, action-packed adventure as Blaze and his sister Sparkle team up to make it back to the Monster Dome in time for a big race.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (L'anniversaire de Starla) S6 (11/24)
programme.desc: «L'anniversaire de Starla»Starla's wild west birthday party is in trouble when her cake gets carried off by a runaway train. Can she, Blaze and AJ catch up and save the cake before it's too late?

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Le trésor du tigre) S6 (13/24)
programme.desc: «Le trésor du tigre»The Tiger Treasure: Blaze, AJ, and Stripes put their explorer skills to the test as they follow the trail to the fabled Tiger Treasure. (S6, ep 14).

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (La plus rapide de tous) S6 (18/24)
programme.desc: «La plus rapide de tous»When a greedy queen casts a spell to make a few of our friends go slow, Blaze and AJ must race her for the magical cure.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Megabot) S6 (18/20)
programme.desc: «Megabot»Megabot!: Blaze and AJ help their amazing new friend Megabot get to Axle City in time for the big Robot Parade. (S6, ep 20).

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Pirate Musical!) S6 (20/23)
programme.desc: «Pirate Musical!»In the first ever Blaze Musical, Blaze, AJ, Crusher, and Pickle are on a daring quest to find the pieces of the Broken Key and unlock a secret treasure.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Histoires au coin du feu) S6 (22/23)
programme.desc: «Histoires au coin du feu»It's a campout under the stars! Blaze, AJ, Starla, Crusher, and Pickle are gathered around the campfire to tell the most amazing stories they can make up! And the best part? Whoever tells the best story wins the last marshmallow!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Sparkle à la rescousse) S7 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Sparkle à la rescousse»When Crusher sends Blaze away with one of his latest cheats, Blaze's little sister Sparkle comes to save the day and bring her brother back in time so they can race together to win the Teamwork Trophy!

programme.title: Santiago des mers (The Pirate Parade) S1 (n°11)
programme.desc: «The Pirate Parade»The Pirate Parade: It's time for the annual Pirate Parade! That is, unless Escarlata has anything to say about it. (S1, ep 11b).

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (La journée du oui) S1 (n°7)
programme.desc: «La journée du oui»Baby convinces Daddy to say "yup" to everything for a day. What's the worst that could happen?

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Swimming With the Sharks) S1 (n°26)
programme.desc: «Swimming With the Sharks»When Baby and his family become reality TV stars, they start to lose sight of what makes them the Sharks.

programme.title: Mini Chef (Mac and Cheese) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Mac and Cheese»Mac and Cheese: Tiny Chef makes rainy day Mac N Cheese but a leaky roof creates chaos in his tree stump kitchen! (S1, ep 8a).

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Un essaim de papillons / Où est La Galinetta d'or ?) S5 (7/26)
programme.desc: «Un essaim de papillons / Où est La Galinetta d'or ?»The statue of Chickaletta has been stolen by Mayor Humdinger and is making its way through Adventure Bay's underground tunnel system.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (La musique et Paddington) S2 (21/27)
programme.desc: «La musique et Paddington»The Adventures of Paddington is a new version of a familiar bear. It's a heartwarming show about being curious, being good to others, and being part of a loving family.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La vente de charité) S2 (19/52)
programme.desc: «La vente de charité»Peppa and George want to go to the playground with Papa and Mama Pig. But a fog sets in and they get lost. When Papa Pig thinks they are back home, the fog clears and they are... in the playground!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Tous à la piscine) S2 (20/52)
programme.desc: «Tous à la piscine»Peppa and George learn to swim, just like Kelly and Karel Konijn. And that swimming is fun through all your life, Papa Pig shows.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Jour de brume) S2 (18/52)
programme.desc: «Jour de brume»Peppa and George make everyone laugh when they dress up as Mama Pig and Papa Pig.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Prank Day) S1 (23/78)
programme.desc: «Prank Day»Prank Day: Today is Prank day, Anna and her friends must compete to elect the best prankster of all. Everyone's doing a great except Christopher, or so it seems. (S1, ep 23).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (A Present for Ron) S1 (24/78)
programme.desc: «A Present for Ron»Christopher loves Ron's rock collection so much, he wants to add another beautiful rock to it! They set off on a journey to find the most amazing rock they can find. When they discover it - they must figure out a creative solution to get it to Ron!

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Pour maman / Barbacarambolage) S1 (n°18)
programme.desc: «Pour maman / Barbacarambolage»The barbababies prepare a show for Barbamama's birthday. While Barbalala finishes up, they go to the carnival where Barbabeau gets stuck in an attraction. // Three separate stories telescope into a big final bouquet in the middle of the courtyard.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Les nouvelles lunettes de Magenta) S1 (9/17)
programme.desc: «Les nouvelles lunettes de Magenta»It's an exciting day for Magenta because she's getting glasses! We play a special game of Blue and Magenta's Clues to find out what Magenta wants to do when she gets her glasses and we get to go with her to meet.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Une balade en raquettes / L'étang aux canards) S5 (12/26)
programme.desc: «Une balade en raquettes / L'étang aux canards»When Mayor Goodway and the twins are late getting back from a snowshoeing, Jake and Everest call the Paw Patrol to search for them.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Héros d'un jour / Danse avec les robots) S1 (7/20)
programme.desc: «Héros d'un jour / Danse avec les robots»A meteor hits Earth and Mister Steel's heroic demeanor forces Deer Squad to save everyone. A dance competition in Middenbos turns into a mess.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Perruque en fuite / Ça tourne !) S2 (3/20)
programme.desc: «Perruque en fuite / Ça tourne !»When Sir Steel's high-tech wig malfunctions and goes on the rampage in Platinum City the Deer Squad race to the rescue. // The Deer Squad must think fast to save Lady Fluffpot when Sir Steel's filming turns into a Disaster Movie!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Flies a Kite / Paddington the Detective) S1 (13/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Flies a Kite / Paddington the Detective»It's a windy day and Jonathan wishes to play kite with his dad. Since Mr. Brown is stuck at home, Paddington takes Jonathan to the park.

programme.title: Mini Chef (Pizza) S1 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Pizza»

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Boris / Né pour être sauvage) S1 (3/52)
programme.desc: «Boris / Né pour être sauvage»The barbababies find a lost baby elephant and secretly look after it. How will Barbapapa and Barbamama react to Boris? // Boris the elephant misses home. The Barbapapa decide to bring him back to Africa. On the spot, they help Boris to acclimatize.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Le plus tendre des liens / L'empire orange) S1 (5/52)
programme.desc: «Le plus tendre des liens / L'empire orange»While the family makes pottery, Barbabravo and Barbabright try to set the world record for the largest cheese soufflé. // The Barbapapas decide to go to the park. While her brother and sisters play , Barbalib can't help to control everything.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Filouland / Les chevaliers de la mer profonde) S1 (n°10)
programme.desc: «Filouland / Les chevaliers de la mer profonde»Jealous of Baby Shark's popularity, Shadow rebrands the Wreck as his own personal amusement park. // When Baby Shark and friends are playing knights and royals, Vola wants to be more than just a princess.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (La bestiole baveuse) S1 (n°3)
programme.desc: «La bestiole baveuse»A game of Barnacle Ball turns into a rescue mission after Hank's pet rock, Rocky, is hit into the Lair of the Slobber Slug.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Party Time) S1 (22/78)
programme.desc: «Party Time»Anna and Froga want to throw a party..... since it is not a particular party day they decide to celebrate "Tomato Day", But Christopher ate all of the tomatoes ... so they need to find another name... Anna finds the perfect name: Friendship party!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Impatient Christopher) S1 (27/78)
programme.desc: «Impatient Christopher»Christopher can hardly wait for his birthday tomorrow, he delivers invitations to his friends, he tries to figure out what present they are preparing for him. Christopher learns that sleeping is the fastest way for tomorrow to come sooner!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Key) S1 (n°69)
programme.desc: «The Key»The Key: Because of her fear of spiders, Froga locks herself and Ron in the greenhouse to collecting Strawberries for the friends' Strawberry Snack time Musical Feast. (S1, ep 69).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Fruits Surprise) S1 (n°70)
programme.desc: «Fruits Surprise»When Froga and Christopher realize that Anna and Bubu may be making a "fruit surprises" for Snack Time, they try everything they can to preserve the two surprises. Froga and Christopher realized how difficult preserving a surprise can be!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Bubu's New Blue Jeans) S1 (n°71)
programme.desc: «Bubu's New Blue Jeans»Christopher has prepared his annual obstacle race and is excited for all the friends to participate. Bubu's new blue jeans are still drying so he has to wear his brand-new pair to the event, he becomes overly concerned of getting them dirty.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Everywhere at Once) S1 (n°72)
programme.desc: «Everywhere at Once»Anna has prepared her ice cream for everyone but forgets to place it in the freezer. - as she is trying to help all her friends at once, the ice cream melts! Is it ruined or can it be saved?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le garage de Papy Dog) S2 (17/52)
programme.desc: «Le garage de Papy Dog»It is amazing what Grandpa Dog provides everyone within his garage. And fortunately, otherwise you have bad luck with your bad luck as a breakdown! But when something goes wrong with the new car wash, Papa Pig suddenly turns out to be the great savior.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le voyage en montgolfière) S2 (25/52)
programme.desc: «Le voyage en montgolfière»Peppa et sa famille sont à la fête de l'école. Le gros lot de la tombola est un voyage en Montgolfière. Peppa gagne : toute la famille apprécie le vol jusqu'à ce que le ballon s'accroche à un arbre...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Georges attrape un rhume) S2 (24/52)
programme.desc: «Georges attrape un rhume»Peppa et George adorent sauter dans les flaques de boue, même quand il pleut. Mais quand George enlève son chapeau, il prend froid. Après beaucoup de repos, de lait chaud et de miel, George se sent beaucoup mieux. Maintenant il est très heureux de porter son chapeau, même quand il ne pleut pas...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'examen de la vue) S2 (16/52)
programme.desc: «L'examen de la vue»Peppa's friend Pedro wears glasses. In addition, his father is an optician, so Pedro knows everything about glasses and eyes. According to Pedro, Peppa absolutely needs glasses. To see if that is really the case, Peppa can go to the optician ...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le jardin de Peppa et George) S4 (12/52)
programme.desc: «Le jardin de Peppa et George»Granpa Pig comes for a visit and brings Peppa and George seeds for a flower garden. They plant them, but birds want to eat them. Daddy Pig must help out with scaring the birds away. Soon beautiful flowers grow out in the garden, and one of them is taller than the house.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La vétérinaire volante) S4 (13/52)
programme.desc: «La vétérinaire volante»The Flying Vet: Doctor Hamster is having a busy day - there are lots of helpless animals that need her help!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Kylie Kangeroo) S5 (n°14)
programme.desc: «Kylie Kangeroo»Peppa and George meet Kylie Kangaroo and her brother Joey. Peppa shows Kylie how to jump up and down in muddy puddles, but who can jump the highest?

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Zero Waste) S1 (50/52)
programme.desc: «Zero Waste»When they see a beach covered with rubbish, the Barbapapa family decides to clean the beach and use the trash to make a miniature golf course.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Competition Prize / Marvelous Moustaches) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «The Competition Prize / Marvelous Moustaches»The Barbabies win a touchpad. They all want to use it and snaffle it one after another. // Barbazoo collects photos of moustached celebrities. Unfortunately, it's impossible to find the last one: Charles Horseshoe-Furlip. He suspects a conspiracy...

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Mail Truck Blaze) S7 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Mail Truck Blaze»When three big mail deliveries are needed around the world, there's only one monster machine who can deliver it all: Mail Truck Blaze! He'll swim across seas, climb mountains, and venture to the Monster Dome --because mail trucks ALWAYS deliver!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Sparkle à la rescousse) S7 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Sparkle à la rescousse»When Crusher sends Blaze away with one of his latest cheats, Blaze's little sister Sparkle comes to save the day and bring her brother back in time so they can race together to win the Teamwork Trophy!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La biblio-mobile / Monsieur Hellinger voit les choses en grand) S5 (8/26)
programme.desc: «La biblio-mobile / Monsieur Hellinger voit les choses en grand»When Ms. Marjorie brings her bookmobile to Everest and the kids of the mountains, Maynard accidentally sets the van rolling and goes off on a wild ride. // Mayor Humdinger has been carving his face into the cliffs of Adventure Bay!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Au pays des papayes / La récolte de maïs) S5 (10/26)
programme.desc: «Au pays des papayes / La récolte de maïs»Carlos and Tracker make PawPaw juice with the Paw Patrol when they find out Mayor Goodway and Chickaletta are in trouble.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Une pluie de peluches / Le bal masqué) S2 (4/20)
programme.desc: «Une pluie de peluches / Le bal masqué»Jade's first sleepover is an eventful occasion when Stu & Safia make it rain teddies across the city and Central Forest! // Sir Steel is put out when he discovers he's not been invited to Lady Fluffpot's party but the Deer Squad are.
